TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RsaSecurityKey extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AsymmetricSecurityKey

Docs.summary: Represents a security key that is generated using the RSA algorithm. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int KeySize { get; }
.property instance int32 KeySize

Docs.summary: Gets the size, in bits, of the key.
Docs.value: The size, in bits, of the key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> supports key lengths from 384 bits to 16384 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed. It supports key lengths from 384 bits to 512 bits in increments of 8 bits if you have the Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider installed.
